entries.description: Add '--no-interactive' flag to 'sam init' calls when SAM CLI version is greater than or equal to 0.30.0
Added docker network option support for invoking sam applications
Ansi codes are removed from text shown in the Output tab when Locally Invoking Lambda handlers
Adding support for SAM CLI 0.30.0 features in `sam init`: --app-template and --dependency-manager
Bumped maximum (exclusive) supported SAM CLI version from 0.30.0 to 0.40.0.
